001/** Useful functions and shared state for controllers.
002 * @author Sarah Higdon
003 */
004
005// this is essentially a header file 
006// for useful functions that can be used across multiple controllers
007
008package src.controller;
009
010import java.io.File;
011import java.io.IOException;
012import java.time.LocalDate;
013
014import javafx.event.Event;
015import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
016import javafx.scene.Node;
017import javafx.scene.Parent;
018import javafx.scene.Scene;
019import javafx.stage.Stage;
020
021/**
022 *  This class contains useful functions that can be used across multiple controllers
023 */
024public class useful_functions {
025
026    // User role enum
027    /**
028     * User roles available to the app.
029     */
030    public enum user_role {
031        /**
032         * Role defined as not manager or cashier
033         */
034        NONE,
035        /**
036         * Role defined as manager
037         */
038        MANAGER,
039        /**
040         * Role defined as cashier
041         */
042        CASHIER
043    }
044    // Global variable to store current user role
045    /**
046     * Global variable storing the current user role.
047     */
048    public static user_role current_user_role = user_role.NONE;
049    // General helper to switch between FXML scenes
050    /**
051     * General helper to switch between FXML scenes.
052     * @param fxml_file - Path to the FXML file to load
053     * @param event - The triggering UI event (used to find the current Stage)
054     */
055    public static void switch_scene(String fxml_file, Event event) {
056        try {
057            File fxml = new File(fxml_file);
058            Parent root = FXMLLoader.load(fxml.toURI().toURL());
059            Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
060            stage.setScene(new Scene(root));
061            stage.show();
062        } catch (IOException e) {
063            e.printStackTrace();
064        }
065    }
066
067    //tracking current name
068    /**
069     * Current user's first name (for display/logging).
070     */
071    public static String current_first_name = "";
072
073    /**
074     * Current user's last name (for display/logging).
075     */
076    public static String current_last_name  = "";
077
078    /**
079     * Sets the current user's first and last name.
080     * @param first - First name
081     * @param last - Last name
082     */
083    public static void set_current_name(String first, String last) {
084        current_first_name = first;
085        current_last_name  = last;
086        System.out.println("current user name set to: " + first + " " + last);
087    }
088
089    //tracking total price of current purchase
090    /**
091     * Running total price for the active purchase/session.
092     */
093    public static double current_total_price = 0.0;
094
095    /**
096     * Gets the current total price.
097     * @return The current total price
098     */
099    public static double get_total_price() { return current_total_price; }
100
101    /**
102     * Sets the current total price.
103     * @param v - New total price value
104     */
105    public static void set_total_price(double v) { current_total_price = v; }
106
107    // setting all values in x report to zero
108    /**
109     * When true, the next X report render should show all zeros (one-time).
110     */
111    public static boolean zero_x_report = false;
112
113    // last date the Z report was run (null if never)
114    /**
115     * The last calendar date a Z report was run (null if never).
116     */
117    public static LocalDate lastZReportRunDate = null;
118
119}
